name: Ads24 Lite – Ultimate WP Ads Manager Plugin
author: Witoni Softwares

sections.description:
THE MOST ADVANCED WORDPRESS ADVERTISING PLUGIN USED FOR ADS CREATION & MANAGEMENT.MAKES EASY TO SELL AD SPACE ON WP WEBSITE.

Ads24 Plugin has designed for WP Advertising so WordPress Users can monetize website by either placing Ad Creatives or By Selling Ad Space on your website. Ads24 is the best wp ad manager suit for every small to big websites like Blogs,Forums,Business Networks,Niche Wesbite etc.

Ads24 Lite – Awesome Features

  • Show your ads in 15+ Templates
  • Sell Ad Space With Paypal
  • Bill user for CPC,CPM & CPD
  • Create Single Ads,Content Ads,Random Ads,Sliding Ads,Sidebar Ads & More
  • Filter Ads on Category & Filter
  • Graphical Statistics
  • Customize Style & Translation
  • 100% Responsive Ads
  • Easy To Handle WP Ad Manager Panel

Ads24 Pro – Premium Features

BuddyPress Integration – Empower your BuddyPress Portal by selling wp advertising space for different premium spaces on your website.

BBPress Integration – Empower your BuddyPress Forum by selling ad space.

GeoTargeting – Enable WP GeoTargeting Ads and show relevant ads to country,states/provinces,cities,zip codes specific visitors.

AdScheduling – Enable WP Ad Scheduling and display/hide wp advertising using start & end date/time.

User Role Filter – Enable WP Ad user role filter and display ads to only selected user roles.Powerful Feature for Membership kind of sites.

Category/Tag Filter – Enable WP Ad Category or Tag filter and display ads to only category/tags posts.

Mobile Floating Ads – Create Mobile Screen Floating Ads and get High CTR. Most Popular Nowadays.

Mobile Placement – Show Mobile Ads Either in top or bottom of screen without hiding website content.

Device Filter – Hide/Show Mobile Ads on Tab & Mobile Devices.

A/B Testing – Create MultiPle Ads and Perform A/B Test to Leverage your advertisement.

START 7-DAY FREE TRIAL NOW

Ads24 Pro Plugin Demo

See Live Demo

HAVING QUESTIONS ?

We’re Online (LIVE CHAT) Available

START 7-DAY FREE TRIAL NOW

Best WordPress Advertising Plugin

Checkout Why Ads24 considered as the Best WordPress Advertising Plugin and work out of box with every WordPress Theme.

Easy to use

  • Create single or rotation ad in just 2-mins..
  • Works out of the box with every wordpress theme
  • Can integrate with any existing wordpress system

WordPress Banner Ad Plugin

  • Add Banners To WordPress Website
  • Create Banner Rotator to display rotating ads
  • Place Rotator banner ads into widgets
  • Ad Injection also feasible
  • Video Ads also feasible
  • Background Ads also feasible

Responsive Ads WordPress

  • Fully mobile optimized ads
  • Fully functional stats without breakpoint
  • Awesome wp ad manager backend with easy to use

Dedicated Backend

  • Either Create Single or Rotational Ad
  • Select whether you want to show at dekstop or mobile
  • Choose your ad placment
  • And You’re Worpdress Responsive Ads are Ready !!

Fully Configurable

  • Active & Pause any ad,any time
  • Configure the mobile sticky ad placement
  • Configure GeoTargeting Easily
  • Configure Ad Scheduling for different country timezones
  • Configure Filters
  • Useful A/B Testing Stats Grid View
  • Role filter Ads for membership sites

HOW TO USE

  • Download & Install Ultimate Ad Manager Pro Plugin
  • Now you can create Ad
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can create form in WAM Menu
sections.faq:
Can i create multiple ads ?

Yes you’re free to create unlimited ads in Ultimate Ad Manager Pro Plugin.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
